announcements.title: Welcome to RailNorrköping!
announcements.message: The conference takes place at Campus Norrköping, Kåkenhus. Map

announcements.title: Livestream in K2
announcements.message: This session is also livestreamed in room K2 (sound and presented screen)

announcements.title: Livestream of plenary sessions
announcements.message: The plenary sessions may be very full, please be in good time. Plenary sessions will also be streamed to room K2 (sound and presented screen).

announcements.title: Technical visit
announcements.message: Train to Hallsberg (chartered for us) departs at 12:10 from Norrköping C (Norrköping railway station). Walking time from conference venue to Norrköping C is about 15 minutes. Please, proceed as fast as possible from conference venue to railway station.

announcements.title: Thanks for participating!
announcements.message: Thank you for attenedning RailNorrköping! We wish you safe travel home!

announcements.title: Session full
announcements.message: No more seats available in this session

announcements.title: Guided tour
announcements.message: Tour starts at entrance to conference venue and ends at Värmekyrkan (i.e. place where conference dinner is held). Guidance will be in two groups, both starting at conference venue and and ending Värmekyrkan.

announcements.title: Conference dinner
announcements.message: The conference dinner starts 19:30 at Värmekyrkan. Map

announcements.title: IAROR Business meeting
announcements.message: All IAROR members are welcome to the IAROR Business meeting Tuesday at 16:30 in K4, also new members that have applied during the conference.
